name: GROUP BY
query_template: SELECT * FROM (SELECT COUNT({agg_column}), {agg_column} FROM {table} GROUP BY {agg_column}) WHERE ROWNUM <= {row}

name: n rows, ascending order
query_template: SELECT {columns} FROM {table} WHERE ROWNUM <= {row} ORDER BY {order_column} ASC

name: n rows, descending order
query_template: SELECT {columns} FROM {table} WHERE ROWNUM <= {row} ORDER BY {order_column} DESC

name: DENSE_RANK
query_template: SELECT {columns}, {analytic_column}, DENSE_RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY {analytic_column} ORDER BY {order_column}) FROM {table} WHERE ROWNUM <= {row}

name: RANK and DENSE_RANK
query_template: SELECT {columns}, {analytic_column}, {order_column}, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY {analytic_column} ORDER BY {order_column} DESC) AS RANK, DENSE_RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY {analytic_column} ORDER BY {order_column}) AS DENSE_RANK FROM {table} WHERE ROWNUM <= {row}

name: starts with characters
query_template: SELECT {column} FROM {table} WHERE {column} LIKE 'S%' AND ROWNUM <= {row}

name: containing characters
query_template: SELECT {column} FROM {table} WHERE {column} LIKE '%s%' AND ROWNUM <= {row}

name: containing characters
query_template: SELECT {column} FROM {table} WHERE REGEXP_LIKE ({column}, '(v|ph|f)') AND ROWNUM <= {row}

name: containing double vowels
query_template: SELECT {column} FROM {table} WHERE REGEXP_LIKE ({column}, '([aeiou])\1', 'i') AND ROWNUM <= {row}

name: UNION
query_template: SELECT {columns} FROM {table} WHERE ROWNUM <= ({row}/2) UNION SELECT {columns} FROM {table} WHERE ROWNUM <= ({row}/2)

name: UNION
query_template: SELECT {columns} FROM {table} WHERE ROWNUM <= ({row}/2) UNION SELECT {columns} FROM {table} WHERE ROWNUM <= ({row}/2)

name: SUM DISTINCT
query_template: SELECT SUM(DISTINCT CAST({agg_column} AS BIGINT)) FROM {table}

name: AVG DISTINCT
query_template: SELECT AVG(DISTINCT CAST({agg_column} AS BIGINT)) FROM {table}

name: GROUP BY
query_template: SELECT TOP {row} * FROM (SELECT COUNT({agg_column}), {agg_column} FROM {table} GROUP BY {agg_column})

name: n rows, ascending order
query_template: SELECT TOP {row} {columns} FROM {table} ORDER BY {order_column} ASC

name: n rows, descending order
query_template: SELECT TOP {row} {columns} FROM {table} ORDER BY {order_column} DESC

name: DENSE_RANK
query_template: SELECT TOP {row} {columns}, {analytic_column}, DENSE_RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY {analytic_column} ORDER BY {order_column}) FROM {table}

name: RANK and DENSE_RANK
query_template: SELECT TOP {row} {columns}, {analytic_column}, {order_column}, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY {analytic_column} ORDER BY {order_column} DESC) AS RANK, DENSE_RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY {analytic_column} ORDER BY {order_column}) AS DENSE_RANK FROM {table}

name: UNION
query_template: SELECT TOP {row} {columns} FROM {table} UNION SELECT TOP {row} {columns} FROM {table}

name: UNION
query_template: SELECT TOP {row} {columns} FROM {table} UNION SELECT TOP {row} {columns} FROM {table}
